resource.empty.title: No Resources Found
resource.empty.checkCriteriaDesc: Current filters may be too restrictive. Try resetting the search criteria to show all resources.
resource.empty.addToLibraryDesc: Media libraries define which folders contain your resources. Make sure the folders containing your resources have been added to a media library.
resource.empty.configurePathMarkDesc: Path marks define how to identify and parse resources. By configuring path mark rules, the system can extract resource names, tags, and other information from file paths.
resource.order.label: Orders
resource.display.title: Display options
resource.display.hoverLargeCover: Show larger cover on mouse hover
resource.display.previewFiles: Preview files of a resource on mouse hover
resource.display.autoSelectFile: Auto-select first file if multiple playable files exist
resource.display.inlineNameTagsDesc: To display name and tags in the same line, you need to set display properties first
resource.display.useCacheDesc: Use cached resources to improve loading speed. Old data may be displayed if the cache is not updated.
resource.display.filterOptionsCollapseTh: Options exceeding this count will be collapsed
resource.shortcut.title: Shortcuts
resource.recentlyPlayed.title: Recently played
